title: special report on climate change and land 2016

unranked.text: name 5 main human uses of land and freshwater
Estimate the percentage of food that is lost or wasted annually.

cards.term: In 2017 326 million Americans ate 80.67 pounds or 36.67 kilos of beef per person. How much carbon dioxide emissions did this contribute to their carbon footprint?
cards.definition: Each kilo of beef is responsible for 60 kilos of carbon dioxide emissions. Therefore the emissions per person in the United States was (36.67 * 60) = 2.2 tonnes per oerson.
cards.author: Snapdragon
